FuncDef:
The sflow flow-sampling collector command enables flow sampling on an interface.
The undo sflow flow-sampling collector command disables flow sampling on an interface.
By default, flow sampling on an interface is disabled.
CLIs: sflow flow-sampling collector <collector-id> [ secondary <collector-id> ] { inbound | outbound }
undo sflow flow-sampling collector <collector-id> [ secondary <collector-id> ] { inbound | outbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the secondary ID of an sFlow collector.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 2.

Specifies to get inbound direction sampling packet.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When flow sampling is enabled on an interface, you can specify the inbound or outbound direction. Additionally, you can configure two sFlow collectors to back up each other.
